cube


representation of cube points
front face:
1-2
0-3
back face:
5-6
4-7


Cubed

typedef vec3d Cubed[2];
type: C typedef
description: cube double - vec3 position vec3 direction

Cubef

typedef vec3f Cubef[2];
type: C typedef
description: cube double - vec3 position vec3 direction

CubePoint

type: C enum
description: cube point type
CUBE_0
CUBE_1
CUBE_2
CUBE_3
CUBE_4
CUBE_5
CUBE_6
CUBE_7
CUBE_POINT_COUNT

CubeFace

type: C enum
description: cube face type
CUBE_FRONT
CUBE_BACK
CUBE_UP
CUBE_DOWN
CUBE_LEFT
CUBE_RIGHT
CUBE_FACE_COUNT

m_cube_setd

void m_cube_setd(vec3d position, vec3d direction, Cubed res);
type: C function
description: set cube from position and direction - double

m_cube_pointd

void m_cube_pointd(Cubed cube, CubePoint point, vec3d res);
type: C function
description: get point (vec3) from cube

m_cube_faced

void m_cube_faced(Cubed cube, CubeFace face, Quadd res);
type: C function
description: get face (Quad) from cube

m_cube_face_normald

void m_cube_face_normald(Cubed cube, CubeFace face, vec3d res);
type: C function
description: get normal (vec3) from cube

m_cube_setf

void m_cube_setf(vec3f position, vec3f direction, Cubef res);
type: C function
description: set cube from position and direction - float

m_cube_pointf

void m_cube_pointf(Cubef cube, CubePoint point, vec3f res);
type: C function
description: get point (vec3) from cube

m_cube_facef

void m_cube_facef(Cubef cube, CubeFace face, Quadf res);
type: C function
description: get face (Quad) from cube

m_cube_face_normalf

void m_cube_face_normalf(Cubef cube, CubeFace face, vec3f res);
type: C function
description: get normal (vec3) from cube
